General.Name: Haitai Confectionery and Foods Co Ltd
General.Description: Haitai Confectionery&Foods Co.,ltd. produces and sells snack food products in Northeast Asia. Its products include dry confectioneries, ice creams, frozen foods, biscuits, candies, gums, and breads. The company was founded in 1945 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Haitai Confectionery&Foods Co.,ltd. is a subsidiary of CROWNHAITAI Holdings CO.,LTD.
